title: I'm down 88 RP, so I'm submitting this to riot
body:
_I've had my eye on Special Forces Gangplank for a while, but, alas, now that he is on sale, I'm down 88 RP. Here's a poem to reveal the true nature of my yearning to Riot.
_

Special Forces Gangplank - surely a sight to see, 

new with the Black Market, and goin' on sale is he.

At 487 shillings, the pirate you may own,

and in enemies' faces, a barrel will be blown.

Alas, one summoner, Grompy, Gangplank's mate,

will miss this killer deal, at the cost of RP: 88.

Long I have languished, to sail the open sea,

so here, now to Riot, I make my desperate plea.

Dear Riot employees, who created of the champ so valiant,

I wish to possess him, and on the Rift, prove my great talent.

At this point I can see, that the ballad has grown old,

so I leave with just one wish: 'tis merely 88 gold.


_Rioters please view this and rush to my aid._
